titles.title: Calling on the President to order the flag to be flown at half-staff upon the death of any member of the Armed Forces dying from an injury or illness incurred in the line of duty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/28/2006--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should order the flag to be flown at half-staff upon the death of any member of the Armed Forces dying from an injury or illness incurred in the line of duty.
